item.title: Best Horror of July 2025: ‘Together,’ ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer,’ a Western ‘Dracula’ Sequel and More
item.description: Welcome to Horror Explorer, a curated column showcasing the month’s best movies, series, books and everything else spooky worth checking out. I’m William Earl, the editor of Variety.com and the public
